name: Hot Dust
description:
Hot Dust Description:

The game was created with the aim to develop YOUR reaction using the mouse and just have a good time!
Bypass enemies, survive and suffer! All this in my game Hot Dust!

-----------------------------------------------------

Controls: Move: 

with the mouse cursor. AND NOTHING MORE!

Game: 

Esc - main menu.
Space - for off music.

-----------------------------------------------------

NOTE: If your computer's antivirus detects this game as a malicious virus, then I assure you that it is not! The game does not contain any viruses !!! For installation, it is desirable to temporarily disable the antivirus.

-----------------------------------------------------
